label: Point
prompt: Point: click to place a point. Esc cancels.

label: Box
prompt: Box: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Sphere
prompt: Sphere: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Cylinder
prompt: Cylinder: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Torus: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Pyramid: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Tetrahedron: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Octahedron: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Icosahedron: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Dodecahedron: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Hemisphere: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Capsule
prompt: Capsule: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Disk
prompt: Disk: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Ring / Annulus
prompt: Ring / Annulus: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Triangular Prism: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Hexagonal Prism: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

prompt: Pentagonal Prism: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Torus Knot
prompt: Torus Knot: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Utah Teapot
prompt: Utah Teapot: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Frustum
prompt: Frustum: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Mobius Strip
prompt: Mobius Strip: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Ellipsoid
prompt: Ellipsoid: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Wedge
prompt: Wedge: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Spherical Cap / Dome
prompt: Spherical Cap / Dome: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Bipyramid
prompt: Bipyramid: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Rhombic Dodecahedron
prompt: Rhombic Dodecahedron: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Truncated Cube
prompt: Truncated Cube: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Truncated Octahedron
prompt: Truncated Octahedron: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Truncated Icosahedron
prompt: Truncated Icosahedron: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Pipe / Hollow Cylinder
prompt: Pipe / Hollow Cylinder: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Superellipsoid
prompt: Superellipsoid: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Hyperbolic Paraboloid
prompt: Hyperbolic Paraboloid: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Geodesic Dome
prompt: Geodesic Dome: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: One-Sheet Hyperboloid
prompt: One-Sheet Hyperboloid: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: Line
prompt: Line: click start, click end to place a segment. Double-click to finish. Esc cancels.

label: Polyline
prompt: Polyline: click points to draw. Right-click or double-click to finish. Esc cancels.

label: Rectangle
prompt: Rectangle: click first corner, click opposite corner to place. Esc cancels.

label: Circle
prompt: Circle: click center, click radius to place. Esc cancels.

label: Arc
prompt: Arc: click start, click end, click a point on the arc. Double-click to finish. Esc cancels.

label: Curve
prompt: Curve: click points to shape the curve. Right-click or double-click to finish. Esc cancels.

label: NURBS Box
prompt: NURBS Box: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: NURBS Sphere
prompt: NURBS Sphere: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: NURBS Cylinder
prompt: NURBS Cylinder: click to set base on the C-Plane, move to size, click to place. Esc cancels.

label: NURBS to Mesh
prompt: NURBS to Mesh: select NURBS curves or surfaces, then click Run or press Enter.

label: B-Rep to Mesh
prompt: B-Rep to Mesh: select B-Rep solids, then click Run or press Enter.

label: Mesh to B-Rep
prompt: Mesh to B-Rep: select meshes, then click Run or press Enter.

label: Mesh to NURBS
prompt: Mesh to NURBS: select a mesh converted from NURBS, then click Run or press Enter.

label: Interpolate
prompt: Interpolate: select polylines, then click Run or press Enter to convert.

label: Boolean
prompt: Boolean: select solids, then click Run to combine. Esc cancels.

label: Loft
prompt: Loft: select two or more curves, then click Run or press Enter. Esc cancels.

label: Surface
prompt: Surface: select a closed curve, then click Run or press Enter. Esc cancels.

label: Extrude
prompt: Extrude: select a profile, then drag to set distance or enter a value.

label: Mesh Merge
prompt: Mesh Merge: select meshes, then click Run or press Enter to combine.

label: Mesh Flip
prompt: Mesh Flip: select meshes, then click Run or press Enter to flip normals.

label: Mesh Thicken
prompt: Mesh Thicken: select meshes, set thickness/sides, then click Run or press Enter.

label: Transform
prompt: Transform: select geometry, drag gumball handles or enter values.

label: Move
prompt: Move: select geometry, drag a gumball handle or enter XYZ values.

label: Rotate
prompt: Rotate: select geometry, drag a rotation ring or enter an angle.

label: Scale
prompt: Scale: select geometry, drag a scale handle or enter values.

label: Offset
prompt: Offset: select curves, then click to set distance.

label: Mirror
prompt: Mirror: select geometry, then click to define the mirror line or plane.

label: Array
prompt: Array: select geometry, then set direction, spacing, and count.

label: Gumball
prompt: Gumball: click a handle to move/rotate/scale, click again to confirm.

label: Undo
prompt: Undo: click or press Cmd/Ctrl+Z to undo the last action.

label: Redo
prompt: Redo: click or press Cmd+Shift+Z or Ctrl+Y.

label: Copy
prompt: Copy: click or press Cmd/Ctrl+C to copy selection.

label: Paste
prompt: Paste: click or press Cmd/Ctrl+V. Choose placement: in place, cursor, origin.

label: Duplicate
prompt: Duplicate: click or press Cmd/Ctrl+D. Alt-drag also duplicates.

label: Delete
prompt: Delete: click or press Delete/Backspace to remove selection.

label: Cancel
prompt: Cancel: click or press Esc to cancel the active command.

label: Confirm
prompt: Confirm: click or press Enter to commit the active command.

label: Focus
prompt: Focus: click to frame the current selection.

label: Frame All
prompt: Frame All: click to frame all visible geometry.

label: Screenshot
prompt: Screenshot: capture the current Roslyn viewport and open the export preview.

label: View
prompt: View: click to switch to top/front/right/perspective.

label: Camera
prompt: Camera: click to toggle camera options (zoom to cursor, invert zoom, upright).

label: Pivot
prompt: Pivot: click a pivot mode, then click a point to place it.

label: Orbit
prompt: Orbit: click-drag (right mouse) to orbit the view.

label: Pan
prompt: Pan: click-drag (middle mouse or Shift+right) to pan.

label: Zoom
prompt: Zoom: scroll to zoom in/out. Click to toggle zoom mode.

label: Selection Filter
prompt: Selection Filter: click Object/Vertex/Edge/Face to change picks.

label: Cycle Selection
prompt: Cycle: click to cycle overlapping picks (Tab also works).

label: Snapping
prompt: Snapping: click to toggle grid/vertex/endpoint/midpoint/intersection.

label: Grid
prompt: Grid: click to change spacing/units or toggle adaptive grid.

label: C-Plane
prompt: C-Plane: click world XY/XZ/YZ or click 3 points to define a plane.

label: Display
prompt: Display: click to switch wireframe/shaded/edges/ghosted/silhouette.

label: Isolate
prompt: Isolate: click to hide/lock selection; click again to show all.

label: Outliner
prompt: Outliner: click to manage groups, layers, and visibility.

label: Tolerance
prompt: Tolerance: click to set absolute and angle tolerance.

label: Status
prompt: Status: click to toggle command help/status bar.

label: Morph
prompt: Morph: select geometry, then click-drag to sculpt. Esc cancels.
